title: Update Bharatnatyam dropdown label/description to include class frequency

requirements.summary: Adjust the shared dance style options so the Bharatnatyam option includes the text "2 classes per week (8 per month)" anywhere style dropdowns are rendered (catalog filter and Create New Class selector).
acceptanceCriteria: In the style dropdown used on the catalog page, the Bharatnatyam option includes the text "2 classes per week (8 per month)" (in the label and/or description).
In the style dropdown used in the Create New Class dialog, the Bharatnatyam option includes the text "2 classes per week (8 per month)" (in the label and/or description).
All user-facing text is in English and renders without layout overflow/truncation issues beyond existing line-clamp behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the Bharatnatyam entry in the shared DANCE_STYLE_OPTIONS so its label and/or description includes the exact text "2 classes per week (8 per month)". Keep the underlying value as "Bharatnatyam" to avoid breaking filtering/selection logic, and ensure the added English text works with existing line-clamp behavior without new overflow issues.
